phrases: I walk through the white pages of my storybook
that is just waiting to be painted
with a kaleidoscope of my experiences
aa yawarakakute atatakai kimi no te
Your hand is so warm held within mine
nigiri shimete sono kokoro no oku made todoku you ni
It reaches all the way into my heart
hohoenmi de kumeta nara nigirikaeshite kuretara
I cannot see a brighter future
boku wa tada mae wo miteru
than you smiling and taking my hand as well
What the hell are you doing?!
What did you do to make her cry?
No, you did not do anything wrong.
You tried to cheer me up
Let us just leave it at that.
Sadako was finally able to compliment you with open eyes.
What, are you both trying to pick her up, Kazehaya?
Wow Sadako, you are so popular having both of them after you!
He is got to be kidding.
You cannot say it like that
If you say it like that,
it could be taken the wrong way!
Are you saying we would take it the wrong way, Sadako?
No one would make that sort of mistake!
Of course he just means it as a friend!
It will make me want to take it the wrong way.
If it bothers you, you can take it that way.
Come on, let us go, that was the bell!
Pin's going to yell at us.
Hey, Kazehaya was really angry, was not he?
Why did we get involved in that?
Aw, lunch break is over already?
We will have to wait until after school then.
but what should I do now?
What should I say to him?
If it bothers you, you can take it that way.
You do not want to be a bother to him, right?
I was already a bother to him, was not I?
I did not even know he liked someone, yet I wanted to keep him for myself
I made him say something that could have been taken the wrong way by accident.
He was just trying to comfort me to be nice
Then it is because of me?
I am sorry you had to look out for me so much.
I am sorry I caused you so much trouble.
You think Miura does what he does out of affection,
and that I find what I do troublesome?
I did those things'because I like you.
I am not who you think I am.
I do not want you to think I am lively or fair or whatever.
I have never treated you the same as everyone else.
But your like is different from mine.
I knew it was like this from the beginning.
You only told me what I already knew.
I knew it, but I still
I could not believe what I was seeing!
With that flashy guy from class D?
Yeah, the three of them were there.
Kazehaya looked kind of pissed off.
He said that he liked Sadako.
But the way you described it, that is what it sounds like!
I wonder if Sawako's with Kazehaya.
Do you know where Sawako is?
Idon't know if she is still there, but the last I saw her, she was outside
Yeah, I saw her by the benches during lunch break
You did not do something you should not have, did you?
Wait up, I will come too
I heard it was a huge scene, whatever happened between Kazehaya and Sawako.
I may have done something I should not have.
I need to snap out of it.
There is the school festival preparations, too.
I cannot be the one slacking off.
But can I really show myself to people right now?
Are you trying to kill me?!
What are you doing sitting on the ground in the dark?!
I was wondering what happened when both you and Shota did not show up in homeroom.
It is because of love, is not it?!
So he went and asked me where you were for that?
It is okay, do not worry about it.
How could you kick your amazing homeroom teacher?!
Why are you sticking your nose where it does not belong?
I was trying to cheer her up!
What was that all about just now?
What did I hear about finding you and getting rejected?
We took our eyes off you for one second and what happened?!
I did not mean to get rejected all of sudden!
What the hell does he think he is doing?!
Sawako, you have got it all wrong.
It is kind of too late for me to say this but
think I thought too much of myself.
I thought Kazehaya treated me just like he treated everyone else,
I have never treated you the same as everyone else.
I think I have always forced him to look after me.
I started falling for him more and more,
and wanted even more of his attention.
Because he went out of his way to tell me I was wrong, that it was not like that.
No, that is not it, Sawako
I know, but wait a sec, Chizu.
It is not like Kazehaya meant to
That is just not right, Sawako.
You do not think that we are friends with you just to be nice or something do you?
I-I did not think of that!
If you think that, then it is your fault that Kazehaya's so angry!
What do you mean, of course things are this way?
How long do you plan on putting yourself down?
She is been put down and avoided for so long that she thinks it is normal.
That is really sad, is not it?
She is a really nice girl.
Chizu snaps when she gets too upset or frustrated.
In the beginning, we thought you were gloomy and strange too.
But now, we know how nice and cute you are.
We are able to feel this way because you were brave enough to tell us.
There is nothing different about you, or us, or Kazehaya.
You just need to believe that.
I am kind of worried about Chizu, so I am going to go after her.
Wash up and come find us.
Did IDid I make a mistake?
I cannot believe I did that!
You were trying to tell me something but I cut you off.
That the girl Kazehaya likes is Sawako.
With things the way they are now, I thought I might as well.
Because I thought you said everything that needed to be said.
What you said was the main problem, and maybe things will change now that it is out in the open.
Sawako will do something about this herself.
She is been able to do so herself so far!
We are able to feel this way because you were brave enough to tell us.
I guess I should have tried harder then.
Have I been trying my best with Kazehaya up until now?
Am I trying my best now?
douka i am about to dake wa furimukanaide
Please do not look at me right now
The sun's set, the wind's blowing,
and we are so close that we can almost touch
My gaze has always been fixed on you
I do not mind if this emotion is what they call love,
and I do not care if I get hurt by it
I just want to tell you, over and over again
